title: Specimen
description: The Specimen category includes 12 metadata fields that describe the donor, organ, and sample being studied.

LocalID.description: Local (lab) reference ID attached to the donor organism (if any).

Species.description: Common organism classification name for the donor organism (e.g., mouse, human).

NCBITaxonomy.description: National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) taxonomy code for species of the donor organism.

ageUnit.description: Unit for the age of the donor.

Genotype.description: If relevant, genotype or transgenetic line information (e.g., Strain name, Cre driver line, Reporter name).

organLocalID.description: Local (lab) reference ID attached to the organ (if any).

organName.description: Component part of the nervous system where the tissue is found (e.g., brain, spinal cord).

sampleLocalID.description: Local (lab) reference ID attached to the sample (if any).

Atlas.description: If an atlas was used to describe the location, list the name of the atlas. Suggested values: Allen Mouse V1, Allen Mouse V2, Allen Mouse V3, Allen Human 34yrs Whole Brain, Whole Brain.

Location.description: (Sub)location or region where the tissue is found.
